latex:
Right triangle $ABC$ has leg lengths $AB=20$ and $BC=21$. Including $\overline{AB}$ and $\overline{BC}$, how many line segments with integer length can be drawn from vertex $B$ to a point on hypotenuse $\overline{AC}$?\\
\\
$
\textbf{(A) }5 \qquad
\textbf{(B) }8 \qquad
\textbf{(C) }12 \qquad
\textbf{(D) }13 \qquad
\textbf{(E) }15 \qquad
$
